title: League client has a critical error --- Wont let me ingame
body:
League client is broken... works sometimes, but most of the time I cant get into any games without critical errors popping up, or bug splats!
This has been ongoing for the last week and a half!
Can someone please tell me how to fix this ASAP!?

Ive downloaded and installed multiple clients, to no prevail, ive repaired the client, ran as admin etc.. and nothing seems to be working.

replies.body:
1. Update your GPU drivers
2. Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
